New Records: Dorian Finney-Smith set a career-high with 5 three-pointers in a single game
Key Match Events: Dorian Finney-Smith made a clutch three-pointer with 60 seconds left to give the Nets a 104-101 lead
Santi Aldama missed a game-winning shot in the final seconds
Pre-Game Insights: The Nets were shorthanded without Ben Simmons
Post-Match Reflections: The Nets moved to.500 and third place in the Eastern Conference
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the second and final matchup of the 2024-25 campaign
Others: The Nets will travel to Boston for their next game
